page.title: 07Family Life.
page.content: {Salter Family} The Salter Family go out quite a lot together and also go to church most Sundays.They have many hobbies between them,such as reading,Mother's Union, baseball and collecting erasers.At the weekends they visit friends,sit in the garden,play sports and watch T.V.They eat together most of the time except for some lunches.The parent's attitude towards discipline is a caring one.The family pets are two guinea pigs. {Hoyle Family} { }The Hoyle family rarely go out together and they don't go to church as a family.A few of their hobbies are computing,trying new recipies,squash and sewing.At the weekends they usually go shopping,walking,or out with friends.They mainly have evening meal together.The parents think the family should have agreed rules.
